poster: M l R R O R
title: Example Kha'Zix - Buff Assassins, Nerf Duskblade
body:
Hey hey,
so I played a lot of Kha in my last games, and since I play a lot (last time I could look it up it was like 3600 ingame hours or something, sadly I cant look it up anymore), and I thought about some gameplay changes that I could imagine working out nicely. 
so the first thing I wanna say is, that no, Kha zix is not in a weak spot right now, he is actually really really strong in solo q, so I don't want to have buffs on that champion, I want some changes. my main issue is that right now his main damage is on his first auto attack through duskblade and his passive, and that is where I just have a problem with the playstyle- his main damage should be on his q, not the auto attack. but it is not only kha, there are many champions whos playstyle is more focused on using the duskblade as efficient as possible, more than the rest of the kit. zed oneshotting enemies with just w e q w auto is another example of that, and then using the ult more as a finisher, instead of trying to do the ult - and THEN the burst, but it is often times not needed anymore. so my wish would be, to get duskblade nerfed, but some ad assassins buffed that for, so the champions tend to feel more like playing the actual champion, not the item. I could imagine for example that kha q could apply onhits, trinity force for example, but would weaker that for in the early game, or it has some execute damage on it like the lee sin q, but resets on kill like his evolved e. this would as well fit into his kit- being the reset plane is soooo satisfying to watch, for example in the oce kha montages, I would really love to see that playstyle more, I think riot actually misinterpreted their own champion design there, for me kha is that little bug that sneaks onto you, rips you apart, and transforms into an airplane (ok, a grasshopper..)
I hope riot overthinks some thinks and maybe makes some little changes, to make the game more enjoyable, rewarding, and more like it was probably meant to be anyways.
Regards, 
M l R R O R
